question: Who is Isengrim Faoiltiarna and what role did he play in the events at Thanedd Island?
answer: Isengrim Faoiltiarna, also known as the Iron Wolf, was an elf and one of the most experienced members of the Scoia'tael. He played a key role in the events at Thanedd Island by leading a group of elves to support the Nilfgaardian allies during the coup.
